resources.string: Enjoy the fantastic view of Sydney and the ocean from Fairfax lookout.

The North Head Wastewater Plant serves 1 million people. Before environmental action was taken, the wastewater plant dumped sewage from the cliff-face. However since 1991 the sewage is treated and discharged far offshore. This has resulted in far cleaner waters for everyone to enjoy.
The North Head Sanctuary Foundation have a display of various native wildlife and plants. Come in and talk to their knowledgeable people about the sorounding area.
